   7: module bsg_dff_en_bypass
   8:   #(parameter width_p="inv"
   9:     , parameter harden_p=0
  10:     , parameter strength_p=0
  11:   )
  12:   (
  13:     input clk_i
  14:     , input en_i
  15:     , input [width_p-1:0] data_i
  16:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] data_o
  17:   );
  18: 
  19:   logic [width_p-1:0] data_r;
  20: 
  21:   bsg_dff_en #(
  22:     .width_p(width_p)
  23:     ,.harden_p(harden_p)
  24:     ,.strength_p(strength_p)
  25:   ) dff (
  26:     .clk_i(clk_i)
  27:     ,.en_i(en_i)
  28:     ,.data_i(data_i)
  29:     ,.data_o(data_r)
  30:   );
  31: 
  32:   assign data_o = en_i
  33:     ? data_i
  34:     : data_r;
  35: 
  36: 
  37: 
  38: endmodule
